abstract: Argentine Pres Mauricio Macri leads effort to persuade soccer star Lionel Messi to reconsider his retirement from national team; Messi apparently quit in frustration after string of major tournament defeats, including second straight Copa America final loss to Chile.
lead_paragraph: Many Argentines are calling for Messi to continue playing for the national team, despite his announcement that he was retiring from the team after Sunday’s loss in the Copa América final.

headline.main: From President on Down, Argentines Clamor for Lionel Messi’s Return
headline.print_headline: From President on Down, Argentines Lobby Messi

snippet: Many Argentines are calling for Messi to continue playing for the national team, despite his announcement that he was retiring from the team after Sunday’s loss in the Copa América final.
